casebody.data:
Oberfelder, Respondent, v. Metropolitan El. Ry. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City,

General Term.

May 2, 1892.) Appeal from special term. Action by Tobias Oberfelder against the Metropolitan Elevated Railway -Company and another.

Argued before Freedman and McAdam, JJ.

Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. R. B. & C, P. Cowles, for respondent. Per Curiam.

The judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
